title: Stock Futures Fall as Bond Yields Edge Higher
sub_head: The 10-year Treasury yield is extending its rise as inflation concerns persist
body:
U.S. stock futures fell and government bond yields rose to fresh multiyear highs as investors worried additional interest-rate rises and measures to contain Covid-19 in China would weigh on growth.
Futures for the S&P 500 declined 2%, setting major indexes up for another day of losses after the New York opening bell. Contracts tied to the technology-focused Nasdaq-100 fell 2.4% while those for the Dow Jones Industrial Average receded 1.5%.
